events.name: Medieval Saturday Mornings: Build an Archimedean Catapult!
events.description:
LIMITED SPACES. STEAM: Launch your child's interest in Science and Engineering to be more future-ready â™¥ Click 'Interested' to stay updated and choose from 4 dates: http://archimedescatapult09dec.peatix.com/

Join us for Medieval Saturday Mornings! We will be hosting catapult making classes every Saturday from 10.30am to 12.30pm in these timeslots below:

http://archimedescatapult09dec.peatix.com/

http://archimedescatapult16dec.peatix.com/

http://archimedescatapult23dec.peatix.com/

http://archimedescatapult30dec.peatix.com/

Recommended for children aged 9 years and above. Youth and adult learners are welcomed. No prior experience needed.

The Catapult is a perfect example of a teachable physics toy. Inspired by medieval siege engines, the Catapult uses torsion-powered rope to generate potential energy to launch projectiles into the air. With simple methods to glue wood blocks together, create your very own catapult and lay siege to your targets!

Unleash your Creativity! Learn how to assemble your catapult parts with the hot glue gun, and basic woodworking tools like saw and drill to build up your target range. .Learn the mechanics and basic principles of how the Catapult fires!

-------------------------------------------

For private tinkerclass sessions catered to your school/family or to learn more, simply get connected with us at support@groundupinnovation.org
events.location: MOX, Katong Point, 451 Joo Chiat Rd, Singapore 427664
